mappings.search: index=main server=$servername$ $timeperiod$ | stats max(cpu) as outputval by server
mappings.response: the max cpu usage of server $servername$ $timeperiod$ is $resultfield_outputval$ percent

mappings.search: index=main server=$servername$ $timeperiod$ | stats avg(cpu) as outputval by server
mappings.response: the max cpu usage of server $servername$ $timeperiod$ is $resultfield_outputval$ percent
the values of fields a  b and c are $resultfield_a$ $resultfield_b$ $resultfield_c$
The stats command enables you to calculate summary statistics on the results of a search or the events retrieved from an index
